video.title: Freakshow
video.synopsis: Todd Ray hosts this unscripted series following his Venice Beach Freakshow, complete with two-headed animals, strange artifacts, and human wonders.

episodes.synopsis: Todd tries to convince a living giant and a bearded lady to join The Freakshow and be a part of the two-headed bearded dragon's birthday party.
episodes.title: Two-Headed Bearded Dragon Birthday

episodes.synopsis: Asia attempts sword swallowing in hopes of participating in sword swallower's day. Competition between the performers heats up.
episodes.title: Swords a Plenty

episodes.synopsis: "The Lobster Boy" joins Todd on a family trip to obtain a two-headed baby.
episodes.title: Two-Headed Baby

episodes.synopsis: Creature tries to reunite with his estranged five year old daughter. Murrugun defies the limits of the human body with his human pin cushion stunt.
episodes.title: Human Pin Cushion

episodes.synopsis: Todd throws a wedding for Ali and fellow little person Matt, trying to replicate the famous Tom Thumb Wedding.
episodes.title: The Littlest Wedding

episodes.synopsis: Todd arranges a Strongman Competition at the Freakshow comprised of guests with unsual strengths. Todd's friend Billy Owen shares his unique story.
episodes.title: Strongman Competition

episodes.synopsis: Todd invites Jesse the Halfman and Jim the Armless Wonder to come show off their superhuman abilities at the Freakshow.
episodes.title: Freaks of Nature

episodes.synopsis: Todd throws a Freakshow Festival with Freaks of all kinds showing up to support the banning of the word "normal" and they do their biggest stunts.
episodes.title: Freakshow Festival

episodes.synopsis: As Todd expands the Freakshow, he needs to find new performers. Garry "Stretch" Turner, with the stretchiest skin in the world, makes an appearance.
episodes.title: Freakshow Auditions

episodes.synopsis: The Amazing Boobzilla comes to perform at the Freakshow. Ali goes through surgery with the support of her Freakshow family.
episodes.title: Boobzilla Comes to Town

episodes.synopsis: Todd brings tattooed people from all over the world to the Freakshow for a tattoo event. Can Creature find a place to live with his looks?
episodes.title: Tattooed Vampiress

episodes.synopsis: Asia looks to expand her electric act. Can she persuade a seasoned sideshow veteran to teach her a deadly and coveted Tesla coil stunt?
episodes.title: Electric Women

episodes.synopsis: The Freakshow takes a trip to the carnival town of Gibsonton, Florida, to learn about its history and tries to revive the town with a performance.
episodes.title: Florida Freakshow

episodes.synopsis: Todd learns about Lobster Boy's dark family history. Asia looks for an apartment. Will George leave his police job to join the Freakshow full time?
episodes.title: Lobster Family Secrets

episodes.synopsis: Morgue attempts a death-defying bed-of-box-cutters stunt. Can George, the tallest American man, find tall love in the big city?
episodes.title: Giants, Babes and Box Cutters

episodes.synopsis: The Freakshow gang attends a camp-out hobo wedding for their friends Digger and Paige. Ali and Matt struggle in their marriage.
episodes.title: Hobo Wedding

episodes.synopsis: Creature meets his estranged daughter face-to-face and relives his break-dancing past. Can Todd pull off a surprise 21st birthday party for Asia?
episodes.title: Creature's Daughter

episodes.synopsis: Space Cowboy attempts to break a world record. When Danielle invites neighbors to dinner, will the Rays' lifestyle scare their suburban neighbors?
episodes.title: Breaking World Records

episodes.synopsis: Todd brings Zamora the Torture King to test the skeptics. Ali and Matt debate the possibility of parenthood and find they may have different views.
episodes.title: Little Baby Fever

episodes.synopsis: Todd holds a suspension event at the Freakshow. When Phoenix starts dating, he must choose between the girl next door and a tattooed young woman.
episodes.title: Freaks Hanging by a Wire

episodes.synopsis: Todd attempts a pop-up show at a suburban mall with his Freakshow performers and a visiting half man, Short E. Dangerously.
episodes.title: Freakshow Pop-Up

episodes.synopsis: In hopes of making his dreams of expansion come true, Todd needs everyone to take on new responsibilities. Are the performers up to the task?
episodes.title: Control Freaks

episodes.synopsis: Danielle and Asia argue about Asia's new style. After a tour of the Magic Castle, Todd is inspired to incorporate magic into his show.
episodes.title: Freakshow Magic

episodes.synopsis: Todd announces that he wants to open a new location in Las Vegas, but can he and his performers persuade the Vegas suits to seal the deal?
episodes.title: Vegas Gets Freaky
